body_html: I'm happy to submit a PR using my implementation of the proposed second option. Please let me know whether that would be helpful as graph_replace was the only way of copying and replacing subgraphs. It would be great to have this working again, especially given that other PRs for similar features have been rejected (#5802).
body_text: I'm happy to submit a PR using my implementation of the proposed second option. Please let me know whether that would be helpful as graph_replace was the only way of copying and replacing subgraphs. body: I'm happy to submit a PR using my [implementation](https://github.com/poolio/tensorflow/pull/1/files) of the proposed second option. Please let me know whether that would be helpful as `graph_replace` was the only way of copying and replacing subgraphs. It would be great to have this working again, especially given that other PRs for similar features have been rejected (#5802).
